articles.author: Edited by Saumya Nigam
articles.title: Apple's upcoming Vision Pro Headset: The fusion of Mac and TV technology - India TV News
articles.description: Apple has had mixed results courting developers. Netflix, one of the most popular consumer video apps, said late Friday it is not making a new app for the Vision Pro, though consumers can watch movies and series on the device's web browser.
articles.content: Apple's Vision Pro has the potential to revolutionize home entertainment and work technology by redefining how people watch television and use computers. Positioned as a potential successor to both t… [+4844 chars]

articles.title: Astrophysics in Crisis? Mystery Object Discovered That Could Change Everything - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronomers discover a celestial object that defies classification, possibly uncovering a new type of cosmic entity at the edge of known physics. Sometimes astronomers come across objects in the sky that we can’t easily explain. In our new research, published…
